content:
So excited to join group and learn from you all!

I'm Jaseem and I'm these days writing a tiny toy scheme compiler in Rust to learn the language and it's been a lot of fun so far! I'll lurk around here for a while and see how I could be of help. In the meanwhile, I'm headed to Rustfest in Barcelona and would love to meet some of you away from keyboard.
I'm at Rustfest a bit busy with org but come and say hi if you see me around!
